channel.title: How do I make it so I dont logout when im moving around?!?!
channel.description:
[size=18pt]I need help from anyone that can solve my question...
Ok, I download Pk World and when i login and move around eventually the client will close and I will be logged out!! I need someones help please!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PLEASE REPLY IF YOU KNOW THE ANSWER TO MY QUESTION!!![/size]:(

item.title: How do I make it so I dont logout when im moving around?!?!
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

This is a much better option.
http://download.cnet.com/Bat-To-Exe-Converter/3000-2069_4-10555897.html
Just click “Browse”–>Find your “run.bat”–>Click “compile”–> Go to your file and use the .exe instead of the .bat there you go.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make it so I dont logout when im moving around?!?!
